fields.name: Muramana
fields.description: +25 Attack Damage +1000 Mana +25% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants bonus Attack Damage equal to 2% of maximum Mana. UNIQUE Toggle: Single target spells and attacks (on hit) consume 3% of current Mana to deal bonus physical damage equal to twice the amount of Mana consumed. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
